subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Masahiro Tanaka, the Yankees’ ace, will be out at least six weeks. If his elbow fails to respond to the prescribed rehabilitation program, it could eventually require reconstructive Tommy John surgery.
snippet: Masahiro Tanaka, the Yankees’ ace, will be out at least six weeks. If his elbow fails to respond to the prescribed rehabilitation program, it could eventually require reconstructive Tommy John surgery.
